name: Munch 'n Crunch Muesli Cookies
author: BakerLady
summary: These cookies definitely live up to their title. They are yummy and filled with all the good stuff! Great for lunch boxes and kids will fall over for these munch 'n crunch cookies! Enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Combine butter, brown sugar, white sugar, and egg in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth
Add flour, oats, malted milk powder, dates, apples, sultana raisins, coconut, baking soda, cinnamon, and ginger; mix until dough comes together
Scoop up 2 tablespoons of dough and roll into a ball between your palms
Place onto the prepared baking sheet; press down to flatten slightly
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 18 to 20 minutes
Transfer to wire racks to cool completely, about 10 minutes
